document_data.name: Singers and Thespians Guild of Opus
document_data.mainbody: The '''Singers and Thespians Guild of Opus''' was a prestigious group of theatrical performers from [[Opus]] in ancient [[Netheril]].
document_data.Activities: The Guild was the most famous band of performers in Netheril, and originated from Opus, the enclave famed for its culture and education. The next most famed group was the [[League of Noted Singers and Performers]] of [[Karsus Enclave]], who performed more tours and were ultimately seen by more people.
